description:
This is a market on the higher placed finisher at the 2022 Miami Grand Prix, Max Verstappen or Charles Leclerc. The race takes place at the Miami International Autodrome in Florida, USA, on Sunday, May 8, 2022.

The market will resolve to “Max Verstappen” if Max Verstappen finishes ahead of Charles Leclerc, and “Charles Leclerc” if Charles Leclerc finishes ahead of Max Verstappen. 

Note:
- If Max Verstappen finishes the race but Charles Leclerc does not, or does not compete at all, the market will resolve to “Max Verstappen”. 
- If Charles Leclerc finishes the race but Max Verstappen does not, or does not compete at all, the market will resolve to “Charles Leclerc”. 
- If neither Charles Leclerc nor Max Verstappen finish the race before May 15 (11:59 PM ET), then the market will resolve to 50-50. 
- If for any reason the 2022 Miami Grand Prix is rescheduled to a date on or before May 15, 2022, the same market conditions will apply.
